work.title: Data Scientist
work.description: During my internship, I am responsible for researching and implementing different statistical approaches in production planning. Those approaches include Simulated Annealing as well as Reinforcement Learning with both classical and Graph Neural Networks.

work.title: Teaching Assistant
work.description: As a Teaching Assistant for the course Introduction to Software Engineering, I was giving tutorials to several groups of ~25 students. Tutorials include brief summaries of lectures, working through exercises, answering questions regarding lecture contents, as well as correcting final exams.

work.title: Researcher
work.description: As a Project Student in the Chair for Economics of Innovation, I was working on a Recommender System for Academic Publications based on Natural Language Processing. This entailed creating Word Embeddings and classifying subjects of publications using methods from Supervised Learning.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: During my internship, I developed a Jira plugin using TypeScript and React.js. The plugin analyzed requests of customers and gave answer suggestions based on past responses. I participated in Workshops on SLAM and Topics in Theoretical Computer Science.

work.title: IT Risk Advisor
work.description: As an IT Risk Advisor, I was identifying weaknesses in companies' IT Security policies. I was also involved in research on reasons why Ransomware, a specific type of malware, is not included in companies' security planning.
